qas.question: What was the name of the song that Kris Allen and Adam Lamber released after American Idol?
Who helped write the song "No Boundaries"?
What was the coronation song for this season?
Unlike every previous winner, the winner of this season failed to achieve what status?
How many contestants from this season reached platinum album status?

context: Both Allen and Lambert released the coronation song, "<a0_0><a2_0>No Boundaries<a2_0/><a0_0/>" which was co-written by <a1_0><a3_0>DioGuardi<a3_0/><a1_0/>. This is the first season in which the winner failed to achieve <a4_0>gold album status<a4_0/>, and <a5_0>none<a5_0/> from that season achieved platinum album status in the U.S.[citation needed]
